## RouterScrollBehavior type

Type of the `scrollBehavior` option that can be passed to `createRouter`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RouterScrollBehavior = (to: RouteLocationNormalized, from: RouteLocationNormalizedLoaded, savedPosition: _ScrollPositionNormalized | null) => Awaitable<ScrollPosition | false | void>;
```
